import React,{useState,useEffect,useCallback}from'react';import{ChartBarIcon,UsersIcon,DocumentDuplicateIcon,ClockIcon,ArrowPathIcon,BriefcaseIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import apiRequest from'../../utils/api';import ChartComponent from'../../components/charts/ChartComponent';import DateRangeSelector from'../../components/analytics/DateRangeSelector';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AnalyticsDashboard=()=>{const[analyticsData,setAnalyticsData]=useState({stats:[],userSignups:null,apiUsage:null,caseDistribution:null,billingData:null,timeTracking:null});const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[refreshing,setRefreshing]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(null);// Date range state
